entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
